variants.Description in input context: This variant causes a proline to leucine substitution at position 983 of the SNCA protein.
This variant results in a threonine to alanine substitution in the SNCA protein.

Material used.Description: The experiment was conducted using the SH-SY5Y cell line.

Readout description.Result Description: SNCA mRNA levels were increased by 1.5-fold for the SNCA:c.2091G>A variant compared to control cells.
SNCA mRNA levels were reduced to undetectable levels for the SNCA:c.1294A>G variant compared to control cells.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type cDNA was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: t-test was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: SNCA mRNA levels within 2 standard deviations of the control group.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: SNCA mRNA levels outside of 2 standard deviations of the control group.
